resources.string: Unknowns have to be between 2 and 20
There was an error trying to solve the equation system
There is one or more empty fields
There is one or more invalid fields
Cannot solve this system of linear equations, one of the elements in the diagonal and all numbers below it are zero
The system of linear equations has a trivial or non-trivial solution

This app uses the Gauss-Jordan algorithm to solve system of linear equations (n x n). The limitation of 20 unknowns has been imposed to avoid performance issues on the device but the algorithm itself does not have any limit.
This app was made by Vanshaj Raghuvanshi. Roll Number: 102216111
